title: Anchovy Hors d’Oeuvres
directions: Slice the baguette. You should get at least 12 pieces out of it. Throw them in a toaster and toast until golden brown.
Meanwhile, rinse and cut the cucumber into 12 thin slices. Place roasted peppers onto a paper kitchen towel to get rid of the excess liquid. You can do the same with anchovies.

When baguette slices are toasted, start assembling the bites: start with a baguette slice, spread a thin layer of mayonnaise, then add a slice of cucumber, roasted peppers, and 1/2 to 1 small anchovy.
Arrange on a serving plate and serve.
ingredients: 70 grams Marinated Roasted Peppers, Thinly Sliced
